## Print out some of the keys using `meta` shortcode

The document yaml defines the following keys:
```yaml
Ykeys-local:
  B: "better"
  C: "cool"
  X: [a="aha", b="bla"]
  
Zkeys: # not merged, _metadata.yaml will get overwritten  
  n: 3

Xkeys-local:
  x: 42

mergemeta:
  Ykeys: Ykeys-local
  Xkeys: Xkeys-local # this key is not contained in _metadata.yml

``` 

In `_metadata.yml`, the following keys were defined:
```yaml
Ykeys:
  A: "awesome"
  B: "bold"
  D: "disastrous"
  X: [d="dumb"]
Zkeys:
  a: "nice"  
```  

The source for the next lines is
```{shortcodes=false}
- Xkeys.x: {{<meta Xkeys.x>}} 
- Ykeys.A: {{<meta Ykeys.A>}} 
- Ykeys.B: {{<meta Ykeys.B>}} 
- Ykeys.X.a: {{<meta Ykeys.X.a>}} 
- Ykeys.X.d: {{<meta Ykeys.X.d>}} 
- Zkeys.a: {{<meta Zkeys.a>}}
- Zkeys.n: {{<meta Zkeys.n>}}
```

- Xkeys.x: {{<meta Xkeys.x>}} 
- Ykeys.A: {{<meta Ykeys.A>}} 
- Ykeys.B: {{<meta Ykeys.B>}} 
- Ykeys.X.a: {{<meta Ykeys.X.a>}} 
- Ykeys.X.d: {{<meta Ykeys.X.d>}} 
- Zkeys.a: {{<meta Zkeys.a>}}
- Zkeys.n: {{<meta Zkeys.n>}}

A new key `Xkeys` was created by the update.
Since `Zkeys` was not merged, the key `Zkeys.n` got lost, as the whole `Zkeys` table was overwritten.
